info.title: Driver Assure API
info.description: API documentation for the Driver Assure backend.

get.summary: Get broker details for the authenticated user
get.description: Fetches the broker details based on the authenticated user's ID.

get.summary: Get broker dashboard insights
get.description: Returns total drivers, verified drivers, pending drivers, pending driver requests, and monthly driver status insight for the authenticated broker.

get.summary: Get broker's driver chart statistics
get.description: Retrieve the percentage of verified and unverified drivers under the authenticated broker.

get.summary: Get driver insights for the authenticated broker
get.description: Returns statistics related to denied drivers, fake drivers, and incorrect driver information for the broker associated with the authenticated user.

get.summary: Get monthly driver request statistics
get.description: Retrieves the total and denied driver registration requests for each month of the year.

get.summary: Send KYC verification link to a driver
get.description: Dispatches a job to send a KYC verification link to a driver who is not part of the authenticated broker's drivers.

get.summary: Get a paginated list of assure drivers
get.description: Returns a paginated list of drivers who are not associated with the authenticated broker.

get.summary: Get denied drivers
get.description: Returns a paginated list of denied drivers with license and employment information.

post.description: Sets the status of a driver to 'active' and dispatches a job to notify the broker.

post.summary: Invite a driver and send email verification code
post.description: This API endpoint creates a new driver, sends an invitation email with a verification code, and provides login details for the driver.

201.description: Driver invitation created and email verification sent.

message.example: An email verification code has been sent to your business email.

400.description: Bad request due to missing or invalid data.

get.summary: Get driver details by ID for the authenticated broker
get.description: Fetches a driver's details including licenses, equipments, and employments, ensuring the driver belongs to the authenticated broker.

get.summary: Get driver statistics for the authenticated broker
get.description: Returns total, ongoing, and completed drivers for the currently authenticated broker. Currently, all values are identical due to placeholder logic.

post.description: Sets the driver's status to 'denied' and dispatches a notification job to inform the broker.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the driver to deny

get.summary: Get a paginated list of drivers with filters
get.description: Returns a list of drivers filtered by search terms, status, and date range. Includes related licenses, equipment, and employment details.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search keyword for driver name or other fields

get.summary: Get expired drivers
get.description: Returns a paginated list of denied drivers with license and employment information.

get.summary: Get Invited Drivers List
get.description: Returns a paginated list of drivers who are in invitation status for the authenticated broker.

200.description: List of invited drivers retrieved successfully

message.example: Invited Drivers List – For displaying a list of invited drivers.

get.summary: Get Verified Drivers List
get.description: Returns a paginated list of verified (active) drivers for the authenticated broker, including company name, license number, and remaining days until expiry.

200.description: List of verified drivers retrieved successfully

post.summary: Assign a load to a driver

message.example: New load has been successfully created.

post.description: Creates a new load with pickup and delivery details.

message.example: New load has been successfully created.

get.summary: Get load summary for the authenticated broker
get.description: Returns the total, ongoing, and completed load counts for the authenticated broker.

get.summary: Get paginated list of loads
get.description: Returns a paginated list of loads for the authenticated user, with optional filters for search, status, and date range.

get.summary: Get load details
get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific load including driver info.

delete.description: Deletes all notifications for the authenticated user.
Deletes a specific notification by its ID for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: The ID of the notification to delete.

post.description: Marks all unread notifications as read for the authenticated user.
Marks all previously read notifications as unread for the authenticated user.

200.description: All read notifications marked as unread successfully

message.example: All read notifications marked as unread successfully.

post.description: Marks an unread notification as read for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: The ID of the notification to mark as read.

post.description: This endpoint marks a previously read notification as unread for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: The ID of the notification to mark as unread.

get.summary: Get a specific notification by ID
get.description: Fetches the details of a notification and decodes the data payload.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the notification to retrieve

get.summary: Retrieve authenticated user's notifications
get.description: Fetch notifications for the authenticated user. Supports filtering by read status and search term.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by read status. Allowed values: read, unread

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter notification content

post.description: Creates a broker with validated data and assigns it to the authenticated user.

get.summary: Get broker onboarding details
get.description: Retrieves onboarding profile details for the authenticated broker, including verification, personal info, company, license, and profile completion status.

get.summary: Start document verification (KYC) process for the broker
get.description: Initiates the KYC verification session for the broker using the Didit Integration service.

200.description: KYC verification process has been started successfully.

400.description: Bad request due to missing or invalid data.

post.description: Verifies a broker's phone number by checking the OTP and updates their onboarding step.

message.example: Your phone number has been successfully verified.

post.description: Updates the broker's primary phone number and sends an OTP for verification.

200.description: OTP sent to the phone number

message.example: An phone verification code has been sent to your number.

post.description: Stores the broker's personal details and updates onboarding step to 5.
Stores company information for the authenticated broker and updates the broker step to 7.
Completes the company information for the broker, uploads an image if provided, and updates the broker's step to 7.

role.description: The role of the broker (admin, manager, staff).

post.description: Stores license information for the authenticated broker and updates onboarding step to 6.
Allows the broker to add their LinkedIn profile URL and updates the broker's step to 7.

linkedin_url.description: The LinkedIn profile URL of the broker.

message.example: An LinkedIn URL has been added.

items.example: The LinkedIn profile URL is required.

post.description: Verifies a broker's business email by validating the provided OTP and updates their onboarding step.

message.example: Your business mail has been successfully verified.

get.summary: Get broker details for the authenticated user
get.description: Returns broker-related information, including user, license, company, and KYC details, if available.

post.description: Toggles the two-factor authentication status for the authenticated user.

value.description: Set to true to enable, false to disable two-factor authentication.

post.description: Creates a new user account and returns a JWT token.
Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token on success.
Sends a password reset link to the specified user's email if it exists in the system.
Resets the password for a user using a valid password reset token.

items.example: The selected email is not valid for password reset.

post.description: Verifies the OTP sent to the user's email for password reset and returns a JWT token if valid.

404.description: OTP invalid or user not found

get.summary: Get a paginated list of posts
get.description: Returns a paginated list of posts including post title, slug, creation date, and the author's name.

title.example: How to use Swagger in Laravel

post.description: Creates a new post with a title and body. Automatically generates a slug and assigns the authenticated user as the post owner.

title.example: How to use Swagger in Laravel

body.example: This post explains how to document APIs using Swagger...

title.example: How to use Swagger in Laravel

body.example: This post explains how to document APIs using Swagger...

get.summary: Retrieve a post by slug
get.description: Returns a single post identified by its slug, including title, body, and author name.

title.example: How to use Swagger in Laravel

body.example: Detailed explanation of using Swagger with Laravel...
